modName: Taken Veterans - Reign and Tsuni the Shock Troopers
summary:
The Shock Trooper is a Static-Mage with Master Alteration
\"Veterans\" are pre-built, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored yet adapted to your new level.
descriptionHtml:
\"Veterans\" are pre-built characters, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored, and adapted to your new level--allowing you to try out advanced play-styles and quest-lines without the hours of involved preliminaries.

Reign the male Altmer Shock Trooper, 
or Tsuni the female Altmer Shock Trooper

The Shock Trooper is a lightning-magic offensive powerhouse. Alteration magic reinforced Light Armor keeps the trooper on the front lines and fast on their feet. Enemies at a distance fall to the crack of the trooper\'s Thunderbolts, and in melee confrontations the shock trooper covers foes in the plasma from Wall of Storms--all while swinging a sword and dodging opponent blows with considerable dexterity. 

The Shock Trooper is always ready to take charge, without putting a positive or negative spin on the mission at hand (ok, ok¬¬). The priority is getting work done, with efficiency and alacrity. What tasks can the Shock Trooper get done for you?

The level 30 veteran has 29 unallocated Perk Points.

Trooper Attributes:
	290 Magicka (+50 Highborn)
	200 Health
	100 Stamina

Trooper Skills:
	Alteration 100
	Light Armor, Destruction 75
	Restoration, Speech, One-Handed 50
	Conjuration, Illusion, Archery, Alchemy, Enchanting, Sneak, Smithing, Pickpocket, Heavy Armor, Two-Handed, Block, Lockpicking 15

1*(100*101/2) + 2*(75*76/2) + 3*(50*51/2) + 12*(15*16/2)
=16,015 [url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Total Experience Spent In Skills[/url]

Trooper Spells:
	Magelight, Detect Life, Telekinesis, Waterbreathing, Detect Dead, Ebonyflesh, Paralyze, Dragonhide, Mass Paralysis, Equilibrium
	Bound Sword, Bound Bow
	Lightning Bolt, Lightning Rune, Chain Lightning, Lightning Cloak, Thunderbolt, Wall of Storms, Lightning Storm
	Steadfast Ward, Close Wounds, Heal Other, Repel Lesser Undead, Turn Undead

Trooper Shouts:
	Disarm (Zun Haal Viik)
	Storm Call (Strun, Bah, Qo)
	
Trooper Powers:
	Imperial Luck (Find more gold)
	Highborn (+50 Magicka & Daily Fast Regen)
	Prowler\'s Profit (Find more jewels)

Trooper Gear:	
	Ring of Recovery	00100e5c
	Necklace of Renewal	0010df5e
	Glass Armor of Eminent Destruction	0010cfa0
	Glass Helmet of Eminent Destruction	000d53c8
	Glass Gauntlets of Major Wielding	000d53af
	Glass Boots of Brawn	000d536f

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation and Use:
Unzip the saved game(s) from the download to your .../My Games/Skyrim/Saves folder, then load it in Skyrim.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
1.0 Shock Trooper is ready to go. Fun, powerful.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Whenever a character earns a rank, r, in a skill they gain r-1 experience. So when a character has 0 in all skills they have zero experience, and when they have 100 in all skills, at around level 81, they have 90,900 experience. A level 30 character should have about 15,865 total experience summed from their skills.

Taken Veterans should look good with any texture or mesh mods you may use, if any. The mods used in the screenshots include:
Face Textures (Female): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url]
Face Textures (Male): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26]Detailed Faces[/url]

Look in the discussions area for the batch commands allowing you to make a veteran out of a character you\'ve created yourself!

More Info:
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Experience Table[/url]
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimCharBatch]Tips on making your own veterans[/url]

Drop a Taken Veteran save game in your Saves folder and load it up. See what you think!
author: Taken
